content: this legal text provides a summary of a case regarding the division of inherited property the case has been ongoing since 1994 and involves multiple parties represented by their respective lawyers the main issue is the division of the deceased fathers estate the court has appointed an expert to determine each heirs share and create a division plan various orders and decisions have been made throughout the case including the payment of certain sums and the appointment of a notary public to oversee the division process appeals have been filed and rejected currently the parties acknowledge a previous judgment and the allocation of shares but further clarifications and completion of the division process are required the case has been remitted to the board for a final decision on compensation and costs the court of first instance has made a final decision granting an application and ordering the transfer of real estate as stated other proceedings related to the case have been dismissed and the costs will be compensated by the parties involved the decision was made on 02052023 by the president of the court dr giovanni donofrio
